Reference

General package functions

General package utility functions, or related topological algorithms.

mapper

S3 method for default plotting

print(<Mapper>)

S3 method for default printing

covers_available()

Print available covers

cutoff_first_bin function

MapperRef methods

Member functions associated with the MapperRef R6 class.

MapperRef

Mapper Reference Class (R6) implementation

as_grapher

Exports the 1-skeleton as a grapher object.

as_igraph

Exports the 1-skeleton as an igraph object.

compute_vertices

Computes the vertices of mapper.

compute_edges

Computes the edges of the mapper.

compute_k_skeleton

Computes the K-skeleton

use_cover

Selects one of the available covering methods to use.

use_clustering_algorithm

Sets the clustering algorithm

exportMapper

Exports the essential mapper graph information

Cover generators

R6 generators which can be used to construct covers over the filter space.

CoverRef

Cover abstract class

Fixed Rectangular Cover

RestrainedRectangularCover

Fixed Rectangular Cover

AdaptiveCover

Adaptive Cover

BallCover

Ball Cover

Utility data structures exported as Rcpp modules.

union_find()

segment_tree()
